solution_line_template: Barney's grocery store started with {initial_items} items + {items_ordered} they ordered = <<{initial_items}+{items_ordered}={total_after_order}>>{total_after_order} items total.
That day they sold {items_sold} items, so {total_after_order} total - {items_sold} sold = <<{total_after_order}-{items_sold}={remaining_after_sale}>>{remaining_after_sale} items.

If there are {items_in_storeroom} items in the storeroom, then there are {items_in_storeroom} + {remaining_after_sale} = <<{items_in_storeroom}+{remaining_after_sale}={total_in_store}>>{total_in_store} items in the whole store.
